## MetaManager pwd

Print current working directory (uses current context)

### Synopsis

When current context is gdrive, prints the current Drive directory.

```
MetaManager pwd [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for pwd
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -d, --debug   enable debug logging
```
